summary:
- **Security Issuance Type**: Employee Incentive Plan (shares issued via salary contribution arrangements)  
- **Total Shares Issued**: 26,082 ordinary fully paid shares (BMT)  
- **Issue Dates**: 9 July 2025  
- **Pricing**:  
  - 8,650 shares at **$0.1892/share** (20% discount to 5-day VWAP as of 30 April 2025)  
  - 10,195 shares at **$0.1605/share** (20% discount to 5-day VWAP as of 31 May 2025)  
  - 7,237 shares at **$0.2261/share** (20% discount to 5-day VWAP as of 30 June 2025)  
- **Post-Issuance Capital**: 290,558,060 ordinary shares on issue; 16,983,337 unquoted performance rights (BMTAC)  
- **Purpose**: Approved under 2024 AGM shareholder resolution.  

**Material Impact**: Minor dilution (~0.01% of issued capital) at discounted prices. No liquidity or structural impact.
